bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Goochland County was formed in 1728 from Henrico County.
An act passed by the Virginia legistaure in 1803 required every free negro or mulatto to be registered and numbered in a book to be kept by the county clerk.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The volume covers the years 1804-1864. The register listed the name, age, color, stature, marks or scars, in what court the person was emancipated or whether the person was born free. Some clerks recorded information not required by the law.
